page.title: 07A BYPASS FOR DUMFRIES
page.content: Dumfries for a number of years has been a major bottleneck for traffic on the the trunk road network.To overcome this problem a bypass is being considered. A survey showed this is one of the main areas of social concern in Dumfries 1985. The merits of both routes are being assessed by the local and central Government. {LINE B cost = Â£8,005 million. This is an outer bypass that separates bypass and town centre traffic. It would need: 1. One piece of property demolished. 2. Less landscaping. Most people prefer this route.
